original_text: You are to take every kind of food that is to be eaten and store it away as food for you and for them.”
korean_text: 너는 먹을 모든 양식을 네게로 가져다가 저축하라 이것이 너와 그들의 먹을 것이 되리라

sentences.original_text: You are to take every kind of food
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 종류의 음식을 가져가야 한다

sentences.original_text: and store it away as food
